hadiths.text: Narrated Ali ibn AbuTalib: I memorised (a tradition) from the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): There is no orphanhood after puberty, and there is no silence for the whole day till the night

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَتَى يَنْقَطِعُ الْيُتْمُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About When One Ceases Being An Orphan
